html:
2025-0672
2025-09-18PS, EPCREmergency Management ActProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 280, QuebecProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 280 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Quebec with respect to the post-tropical storm that occurred from August 9 to 10, 2024.N/A
subject: Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 280, Quebec
precis: Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 280 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Quebec with respect to the post-tropical storm that occurred from August 9 to 10, 2024.
